text: Chisimu Uwwe ni ŵatuchijimusya ŵawe, ni tukulembaga yaŵalongwesye (kupanganya ni katika malipilo gakwe), ni sajo syao (syaŵaliji nkwenda kuja kutenda ibada, ni masengo gaŵapanganyisye gagakwendelechela malipilo gakwe), sano chindu chilichose tuchisunjile (pakuchilemba) m’chitabu chakusalichisya (chilichose Al-Lauh Al-Mahfȗz)
